```{r}
#code that runs every minute for an hour
#problem with this code is that it doesn't account for the time it takes to do
#The calculation
i = 0
while(i < 60) {
  print(paste("its been", i, "minutes since this started, give or take a bit"))
  i = i + 1
  
  Sys.sleep(60)
}
```
